prompt:
Rewrite the following email to be sent to NAME_1, requesting him to provide you with image dataset for Fruit Stem Diseases. You are a research student working under your guide, NAME_2, through her propoer channel you are to request NAME_3 to officially provide you access to their data. Make it sound formal, respectful, and convey the meanings clearly and well-articulatedly:

Respected NAME_3

I hope this email finds you well. I am the Mentor and Research Guide for Mr. NAME_4 who had requested image data from your esteemed organization via email on 03 May 2018.  I am writing to follow up this request from my official ID as requested by your team over phone.

Our research team is currently working on "Orange Fruit Stem Diseases" and we believe that the image data you have collected would be extremely valuable to our project. We would like to request access to this data in order to further our research.

If possible, we would prefer to receive the image data in JPG format. However, we are open to other formats if that is more convenient for you. Also, we hope, you can provide us atleast 1000 images of stem bleeding, the more you can provide, will be much appreciated.

Thank you for considering our request. If there is any additional information that you need from us, please do not hesitate to ask.
response:
Subject: Request for Image Dataset for the Study of Orange Fruit Stem Diseases

Dear NAME_3,

I hope this email finds you well. I am writing on behalf of Mr. NAME_4, who had requested image data from your esteemed organization via email on 03 May 2018. As Mr. NAME_4's Mentor and Research Guide, I am writing to follow up his request from my official ID, as requested by your team over phone.

Our research team is currently working on the study of "Orange Fruit Stem Diseases," and we believe that the image data you have collected would be of great value to our project. We would like to request access to this data in order to further our research.

If possible, we would prefer to receive the image data in JPG format, but we are open to other formats if that is more convenient for you. Additionally, we kindly request that you provide us with at least 1000 images of stem bleeding, but any additional images you can provide will be greatly appreciated.

Thank you for considering our request. If there is any additional information that you need from us, please do not hesitate to ask.

Sincerely,\[Your Name\]
